concept.title: LAYLCK Command
concept.shortdesc: Locks the layer of a selected entity.

conbody.p: Lock the layer of a selected entity to prevent entities on that layer from being edited.

p.b: Select an entity on the layer to be locked

conbody.p: Select an entity on the layer you want to lock.

The Command line indicates which layers have been locked:
This layer has been locked: LayerName1
This layer has been locked: LayerName2
Entities on locked layers are faded by default. You can change layer fading with the LAYERLOCKFADECTL system variable.
